title: Switching regions bug? (NEED HELP PLEASE)
body:
So i was diamond 5 on eune with decent mmr for that league, i transfered to euw and i was placed in gold 1, now whats the suprise is that i had -3 points in gold 1 and i had 5 games low priority queues of 10 minuteS? and i have never been punished on eune and have been granted many honors.


??

replies.body:
If you had racked up some low-priority queue before transferring to EUNE, then you'd see the LPQ's when you transferred back. If you have any further questions about this, I definitely recommend reaching out to our game specialists in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any issues creating a ticket.

Hello, you should contact Player Support, they will be able to track down what could have happened:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
